ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03

Interface Observer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachPhotosFragment, BrowsableInventories, ConfigurationActivity, EditProfileFragment, FriendsListFragment, FriendsSearchFragment, Inventory, Item, ItemFragment, ItemTileFragment, PhotoGalleryFragment, PrimaryUser, TradeList, TradeOfferHistoryFragment, TradeTileFragment, User, ViewProfileFragment

    public interface Observer
    Observer in the Observer Pattern, responsible for changing their state told to update by an Observable they are observing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(Observable observable)
      Called by the Observable that the Observer is observing when a change happens to the Observable.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(Observable observable)
        Called by the Observable that the Observer is observing when a change happens to the Observable.
        Parameters:
        observable - reference to the Observable that triggered the update()
